home-about.caption: About
home-about.author-message: Hey, this is Alex, a software engineer based in Russia. I enjoy creating things using the most modern technologies. On this site I would like to share my ideas, which have accumulated quite a lot. Hope you find some of my work interesting.

home-about.card-photos-message: I love to travel and the camera is my irreplaceable companion. This is a collection of my works as a photographer.
